item.title: Woman Wanted to Kill Husband Like Meghalaya Honeymoon Murder: Gadwal Police
item.description:
<![CDATA[Hyderabad: Taking a cue from the sensational Meghalaya honeymoon murder, the 22-year-old Aishwarya planned a similar method of killing her husband Tejeswar if the first attempt failed in Gadwal district on June 17. A GSP tracker was also fixed to Tejeswarâ€™s bike to track his movements.
Unfortunately, she, in the first attempt, succeeded in killing her husband within a month after their marriage with the help of her paramour Tirumala Rao, who is working in a non-banking financial company (NBFC) ...]]>
item.author: M Srinivas, About The Author
